EmailTemplate.description: Sent to clients to assure overall satifaction of quality service they have recieved from Support.
EmailTemplate.name: Overall Satisfaction Support Survey Template
EmailTemplate.subject: VinSolutions would like your help to make sure we have been providing excellent Dealer Support!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
VinSolutions welcomes you to complete a quick customer service survey to ensure that we are meeting or exceeding your expectations of the quality of service you have been receiving from Dealer Support.
Please click on the Tell Vin link below to take the survey.
Tell Vin
If you need immediate assistance from us, please do reply to this email and action will be taken to get you a callback from a Support Representative.
Thanks in advance for your time,
Your VinCare Team
